title: Can you include a debt from a foreign creditor in a foreign country in a bankruptcy filing in the U.S?
question: an uncollected debt from credit obtained in a foriegn country, combine with all other uncollected debt , obtained locally under one chaper 7 filing?
answers: No, although a US discharge will prevent the collection of a foreign debt in the US (just not outside the US).
